synopsis.text: Their father's overseas job has left Wakamatsu Masato and his non-blood related stepsister, Miyuki, to fend for themselves in the bustling city of Tokyo. Masato, an ordinary high school student, finds himself in a complex web of emotions as he navigates his feelings for two Miyukis - his sweet, sensitive, and popular stepsister, and his classmate, Kajima Miyuki, who embodies every high school boy's dream with her gentle demeanor and captivating beauty. As Masato grapples with his growing attraction towards both Miyukis, he must untangle his feelings and make a choice, or risk leading a life of deception and two-timing.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
